send_to_cs: Send to CS for repair/customization requests
escalate: If a cx had issues after a sale is over, ESC to see if they can honor the deal
ESC immediately, if the customer asks when an order will ship
If a cx has a request for urgent delivery ESC and they'll prioritize it
ESC if a cx is having trouble placing an order
If a cx asks for an update regarding an email they sent, ask for their email address, then ESC
ESC immediately if a cx is very upset
ESC if cx's have issues applying both loyalty codes
tone: Close the convo once the client takes over
templates: ‚ûú Ask which item the customer has
‚ûú If it's an Ellington item from before 2016, use ECR shortcut
dos_and_donts: For stock questions, check the product page to look for possible back-in-stock dates
If cx calls after hours, advise them to leave a voicemail and the team will be sure to call back
drive_to_purchase: When recommending a pre-order item - set proper expectations and mention the date it'll be back in stock
promo_and_exclusions: They have a loyalty program where cx's can use code MMLEGACY20 & FAITHFULSHIPPING at the same time to receive 20% off plus free shipping. The MMLEGACY20 code only applies to cxs who have spent $2000+
‚ûú These are the only 2 codes that can be stacked, and they can only be stacked with each other and no other code
Welcome code works on discounted/sale items
DO NOT share the WELCOME15 code with cx's, it's no longer valid

conversation.message_text: Mission Mercantile: Welcome to Mission Mercantile! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel.
Mission Mercantile: Hey this is Sarah, how can I help you? Stop to stop
Hey, I need help. I need a contact number for Haley. I just received a repair item and there are multiple issues. Thank you.
I would like to speak to someone.
Mission Mercantile: I'm sorry to hear that! Email us directly at shopkeeper@missionmercantile.com or give us a call at 210-504-6698 and we'll take great care of you. Our team is happy to help!

Thanks Sarah!
I think Haley would be best to address this issue but if she is unavailable I would be happy to speak to anyone.
Mission Mercantile: I'm sorry, but I don't have Haley's direct contact information. You can try reaching out to the team, and they should be able to point you in the right direction.

The phone number is saying after hours and leave a message. I would like to address this issue ASAP as I have waited for months for repair of this item and it was returned  without having the promised work completed and  in very poor condition. Thank you.
Are you able to help Sarah?

Hey, I need help. I need a contact number for Haley. I just received a repair item and there are multiple issues. Thank you. The phone number is saying after hours and leave a message. I would like to address this issue ASAP as I have waited for months for repair of this item and it was returned without having the promised work completed and in very poor condition. Thank you.

Mission Mercantile: I'm so sorry to hear that, and I completely understand your frustration. Please know that I have limited access on my end. 

I'll check on this with our team. As soon as I hear back, I will send you a message right away.

Ok. I understand and truly appreciate your concern and assistance. 
I am very frustrated at this point but hope that all will work out!
Best regards,
Brian
Mission Mercantile: I apologize for this experience. I'll be sure to keep you posted.
Great. I appreciate that. Hope you have a nice evening!
Mission Mercantile: You're welcome! While I wait to hear back from my team, is there anything else I can assist you with in the meantime?
That's all for now. Thank you so much!
Is there a site to upload photos?  Or is it best to wait until I connect with a representative tomorrow?

Mission Mercantile: Sorry, there isn't a site to upload photos, but you can send them to shopkeeper@missionmercantile.com Since I've already forwarded this to our team, it's best to wait for their guidance to avoid any mix-ups. If they need the photo, we'll let you know. I'll make sure this is prioritized and will monitor it closely.
Perfect. Many thanks Sarah!

Mission Mercantile: Thanks for getting back to me, and you're most welcome! Rest assured, we'll get back to you as soon as possible. Feel free to let me know if you need help with anything else in the meantime.

Add the product links cx are inquiring about to your ESC notes
templates: For post purchase issues, use OIS shortcut
For gift exchange inquiries, use GEX shortcut
If the cx didn't receive the gift from the gift exchange program!, use GGE shortcut
If cx's say the item they want isn't on sale, don't use ncode, use SGS temp
dos_and_donts: Send links only from the US site
Use NordLayer when accessing their website

conversation.message_text: Fluevog: Reply Y to subscribe to recurring automated personalized marketing alerts (e.g. cart reminders) from Fluevog.
Fluevog: Welcome to Fluevog! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel.

Fluevog: You've officially doubled your chances to snag a $200 GC! It's like winning the shoe lottery, but without the confetti clean-up. Start shopping: usvog.attn.tv/a5Q2Pb8LDj9- 
Questions? Just give us a shout!
Fluevog: Did you mean to leave Dollyvogs Waldorf: Black/Rhinestone behind? It's still waiting for your return. Take another look: usvog.attn.tv/aFMxm8Xl6maG

Fluevog: Hey there, sole-searcher! We noticed you eyeing our fabulous kicks. Have you checked out our best sellers yet? They're so popular, even the floor is jealous! Take another look: usvog.attn.tv/aFHwx-fq5Iyz
No. I'm still waiting on an order. I do not believe I will be doing business with you anymore once my order comes.

Fluevog: I'm sorry to hear that, and I understand the frustration! Are you referring to the order placed on 2/3? If so, please note that after you place your order, it goes through an order processing stage (preparing, packaging, etc.), which can take up to 3 business days. Just to be sure, did you receive any tracking info? Please check your spam and promo folders as well, as our emails sometimes end up there.
Yes. I did. the zip code was wrong so they were shipped back to New Orleans and there has not been an update since the 6th.
They made it to Oakcreek which is 30-45 minutes away and would not update the zip and shipped them back for them to be shipped back to me again. if that makes a sense whatsoever. Where are my shoes?

Fluevog: I'm really sorry for all the inconvenience. Since the package is already with the carrier, it's best to contact them directly. Have you tried giving them a call? They should have the most up-to-date information.
No, I haven't called. I have horrible Social phobia. I am unable to use the phone. I used UPS's website and cannot get any answers. So more or less I have to eat the cost of the shoes.
Fluevog: I'm so sorry about that. Let me double-check this with my team. Can I please have your order number, full name, email, and the region you are shopping from?
20260203-00593198 Shannon R Bishop bisho022@uwalumni.com Kenosha, WI 53144
voc: I'm still waiting on an order. I do not believe I will be doing business with you anymore once my order comes. 20260203-00593198 Shannon R Bishop bisho022@uwalumni.com Kenosha, WI 53144
Fluevog: Thanks! Let me pass this on to my team. I'll be in touch as soon as I get an update.
Thank you.
Fluevog: You're welcome! We appreciate your patience.
Any word on my shoes? This is getting ridiculous .
Fluevog: My sincere apologies. I'm still waiting to hear back from my team regarding this, but rest assured, I'm keeping an eye out. As soon as I get an update, I'll let you know right away.
It's been two days and you still don't know where my shoes are? It's almost been a week since they were sent back to New Orleans. Where are my shoes? I have been nice and patient.

Fluevog: I completely understand your frustration, and I'm so sorry again for the inconvenience. Our team might currently be experiencing a high volume of inquiries, which is causing some delays.

Please be assured that I'm actively following this up, and I will update you as soon as I receive a response. Thank you so much for your patience and understanding.
6 days ago a label was created. Where are they? I've not been offered my money back, partial refund. No answers. Never again.

Fluevog: I'm truly sorry for the frustration and the lack of updates, I completely understand how upsetting it is to wait this long without a clear resolution. Our team is still looking into this, and I really appreciate your patience. This is not the experience we want for our customers, and I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. Alternatively, you can email us directly at service@fluevog.com. Our team is happy to help!
I have emailed your team. I sent an email a week ago and no one answered it.

Fluevog: We sincerely apologize for the delay! The team is experiencing a high volume of emails, but they'll respond to you as soon as possible. We really appreciate your patience on this and hope you can give us more time to reply. Please check your spam and promotions folders, as our emails sometimes end up there. Our team is happy to help!

For prescription orders questions use RPO shortcut
